subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Rajasthan's Capital and Famous Historical Places
question_en: What is the capital of Rajasthan and which famous historical places are located here?
question_hi: राजस्थान की राजधानी और इसे मौजूदा इतिहासिक स्थानों
explanation_en: Jaipur is the capital of Rajasthan, and Udaipur is famous for its historical importance. Other notable historical places in Rajasthan include Jodhpur (Meenasagar ki Rajasthan mein), Ajmer (अजमेर), and Jaisalmer (जयसलमर).
explanation_hi: राजस्थान की राजधानी है जैसालमर, और उदयपुर को इतिहान को एक मेनासागर (मेनासागर) में वर्णी है, अजमेर (अजमेर) में एक इतिहान को एक मेनासागर (मेनासागर) में उपयोगाँवाणी है।
A_en: Jaisalmer (Jaisalmer) is known for its historical importance and is a popular tourist destination.
B_en: Jodhpur (Jodhpur) is renowned for its Mehrangarh Fort and Umaid Bhawan Palace.
